function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete data on income","Impact":"Biased analysis, inaccurate conclusions","Mitigation":"Impute missing income data or use statistical methods to account for missingness","Technologies":"Statistical imputation, multiple imputation, robust regression","People":"Researchers, statisticians","Owner":"Research team, statistical analysts"},{"Description":"Presence of contagious psychiatric conditions","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion within the population, mental health challenges for affected individuals","Mitigation":"Provide appropriate treatment and support for affected individuals, implement public health measures to address stigma and promote mental well-being","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health apps, public health campaigns","People":"Individuals with psychiatric conditions, general population","Owner":"Healthcare providers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Incomplete assessment of physical activity level","Impact":"Potential misrepresentation of the association between physical activity and mental well-being","Mitigation":"Implement robust measurement tools for physical activity assessment, consider using multiple data sources for validation","Technologies":"Wearable activity trackers, mobile health apps, validated surveys","People":"Study participants, researchers","Owner":"Research team, data collection specialists"}]}
